title: Scarf, 1920–1929
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: compound satin weave
description: Large square, with small regular allover pattern of pointed palmettes, in orange shot with gold strips on a brown satin ground. Reversible with colors and gold in interchanged positions. Bordered with vermillion creped silk into which brown squares are inserted at each corner and at center of each side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Scarf, 1920–1929.
1920–1929. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: compound satin weave. Gift of Rodman A. Heeren. 1960-151-11.
